digraph auth_flow {
  rankdir=TB;

  n1 [label="Start", shape=ellipse];
  n2 [label="Authenticated?", shape=diamond];
  n3 [label="Grant access", shape=box];
  n4 [label="Show login form", shape=parallelogram];
  n5 [label="End", shape=ellipse];

  n1 -> n2;
  n2 -> n3 [label="yes"];
  n2 -> n4 [label="no"];
  n3 -> n5;
}
